item.title: Memory
item.description: Working with device memory using Vulkan Vulkan moves most of the complexity related to memory allocation to the user code, the API provides a very small set of functions to handle memory. This post has focus on the Vulkan API but most ideas are applicable to DirectX 12 as well. Memory allocation Device visible memory is provided in few memory heaps. Each heap backs one or more memory types. One memory type is backed by one heap.
